subject: Indians, American
Baseball
Tribes and Tribalism
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: With every pitch, Yankees pitcher Joba Chamberlain peels back the stereotypes of the American Indian athlete as problematic, as fearful of success, as self-loathing.
snippet: With every pitch, Yankees pitcher Joba Chamberlain peels back the stereotypes of the American Indian athlete as problematic, as fearful of success, as self-loathing.
